alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 4:22PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Campbell and northwestern Crook Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 422 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Lightning Flat to 11 miles west of Rockypoint. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockypoint and Lightning Flat. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
